column1: Instead of our top GOP leaders working to protect Michigan against COVID-19 they are going to Washington D.C. to discuss how to ensure that hundreds of thousands of Michigan voters' voices are silenced.  https://t.co/Cws3NxUZWH

From the beginning of this pandemic I said that we needed a national testing strategy. #TotallyUnderControl shows the Trump administration's failure to use testing to slow the spread of COVID-19! #TotallyUnderControl

A beautiful tribute. My heart goes out to everyone who has lost a loved one to COVID19. It truly did not have to be this bad...if only @realDonaldTrump had taken this virus seriously earlier.    https://t.co/EWN2FbrOZo

Today we passed the grim milestone of 100000 deaths from COVID-19. In Michigan we've lost more than 5000 blessed souls. It's a staggering loss of life. To anyone grieving the loss of a loved one or struggling because of the virus my heart goes out to you & your family.
Michigan has been hit hard by COVID-19 and now we're dealing with catastrophic flooding. It is unconscionable he's turning his back on us just because we’re making it easier for people to vote.

Over 5000 COVID-19 deaths catastrophic floods and broken dams and @RealDonaldTrump is threatening to withhold funding from Michigan because we're making it easier to vote. Michigan deserves better and with @JoeBiden we'll get it. https://t.co/BoK8WoznBr
My COVID-19 virtual town hall with @GaryPeters is starting now. I hope you can watch.  https://t.co/QqcfBIuTGj
